title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Generative AI-Enhanced Environmental Science Behavioral Competency Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design three types of environmental problem analysis scenarios using generative AI and propose mathematically verifiable solutions.
Learners can develop personalized environmental action plans aligned with the ESA (Environmental Science Agency) competency framework at a level where over 80% implementation is feasible.
Teams can develop a 5-step verification checklist to assess the credibility of AI-generated content and validate its feasibility through practical application cases.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
